SKILL_NAME: the Dabble Lab address information template
WELCOME: Welcome to {}. You can say: what is my location, to hear the address associated with this device.
WELCOME_REPROMPT: Say: what is my location, to hear the address associated with this device.
HELP: Try asking me for your address.
HELP_REPROMPT: You can ask me about your address to confirm if I can access it.
FALLBACK: Sorry, I didn't understand that. You can say: what is my location, to hear the address associated with this device.
FALLBACK_REPROMPT: You can say: what is my location, to hear the address associated with this device.
NOTIFY_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: Please enable device location permissions in the Amazon Alexa app.
NO_ADDRESS: It looks like you don't have an address set. You can set your address from the Alexa companion app.
LOCATION_FAILURE: There was an error with the Device Address API. Please try again.
ERROR: Sorry, I wasn't able to handle your last request. Could you say that again?
